purpose.task: Identify the genus (属) of this flower
purpose.context: The image contains an ornamental flower (confirmed by Q0.1)
purpose.why_important: Accurate genus identification is critical for subsequent disease diagnosis

visual_clues.Rosa: Compound leaves with 5-7 leaflets, thorny stems, layered petals
visual_clues.Prunus: Simple oval leaves with serrated edges, 5-petal flowers, smooth bark
visual_clues.Tulipa: Long narrow leaves, cup-shaped flowers, smooth stem without branches
visual_clues.Dianthus: Narrow linear leaves, fringed petal edges, swollen stem nodes
visual_clues.Paeonia: Large compound leaves, large multi-layered flowers, thick stems
